Reference

All functions

add_leanpub_collaborator()

Add Leanpub as Collaborator

check_course()

Check Leanpub Course

make_course() check_structure()

Check for expected file structure and create missing

create_images()

Create PDF and PNGs from Google Slides

create_lesson() create_lessons_from_book()

Create a Lesson

create_videos()

Create video from script and PNGs

didactr_auth() check_didactr_auth() didactr_token() is_didactr_authorized()

Authorize Application for didactr

flag_code_chunks()

Flag Code Chunks

gs_ari() gs_ari_spin()

Convert Google Slides and notes to video with ari

gs_ari_upload()

Convert Google Slides to Video and Upload to Youtube

gs_convert()

Convert Google Slides to PNGs and a script

gs_id_from_slide() get_image_link_from_slide() get_image_from_slide()

Google Slides Helper Functions

gs_slide_code()

Get Slide Code from Google Slides

gs_slide_df() notes_from_slide() gs_notes_from_slide() notes_from_slide_output() gs_get_slides() gs_speaker_notes_id() gs_replace_notes()

Get Google Slide Elements IDs

install_ffmpeg()

Install ffmpeg from a command line installer

is_language_auth()

Is Google Language API Authorized

leanpub_render()

Render Leanpub document

n_pdf_pages()

Count number of pages in PDF

pdf_to_images()

Convert PDF to Other Images using ImageMagick

pptx_notes()

Get Notes from a PowerPoint (usually from Google Slides)

rename_pngs_to_gs_ids()

Rename set of PNGs to Google Slide IDs

script_to_slide_notes()

Upload script to Google Slide Deck Notes

start_course() create_course() create_github_course()

Starting a Course, Light wrapper for make_course

strip_manuscript()

Strip Markdown from Manuscript

summary(<course_check>)

Summary of course check

translate_course()

Translate Course to Another Language

check_manuscript_backticks() translate_manuscript() translate_script() chunk_google_translate() gl_detect_file()

Translate Mansucript File

translate_slide()

Translate Google Slide Text to Another Language

translate_swirl()

Translate Swirl YAML to another language

update_youtube()

Update RDS object that tracks YouTube uploads

update_youtube_link()

Update Youtube Link

vids_to_youtube()

Upload videos to YouTube

xml_notes()

Get Notes from XML

yt_auth()

Authorize with Youtube
